alert.note: Alert for Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 8:46AM CDT until June 02 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie affecting Miami County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Low-lying areas along the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 28.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Fri 1pm 1am 1pm Marais Des Cygnes River Osawatomie 28.0 28.4 Thu 8am 28.6 25.8 19.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
